Auth.name: Name
Auth.forgot_password_description: We'll send you a password reset link via email
Auth.reset_password_description: Please enter your new secure password
Auth.token_expired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
Auth.check_email_for_reset_link: We've sent you an email with a password reset link. Please check your inbox.
Auth.verification_success_message: Your email address has been successfully verified. Please proceed to the sign-in page.
Auth.verification_failed: Email verification failed. Please try again or contact support.
Auth.token_missing: Verification token is missing from URL
Auth.verification_email_sent: If an account with that email exists and is unverified, a verification email has been sent.
Auth.invalid_reset_link: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
Auth.email_verification_pending_description: Your account has been created. Please verify your email address to continue.
Auth.verification_email_sent_description: We've sent a verification email to your registered email address. Please click the link in the email to complete your account verification.
Auth.resend_verification_description: Enter your email address to receive a new verification email
Auth.verification_email_resent_description: Your verification email has been resent. Please check your email to continue.
Auth.verification_email_resent_success: We've resent the verification email to your registered email address. Please click the link in the email to complete your account verification.

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password_max_length: Password must be at most 256 characters
validation.password_complexity: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and one special character
validation.name_min_length: Name must be at least 1 character
validation.token_min_length: Token must be at least 1 character

hero.title: Build modern web applications
hero.description:
Complete web application template using TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
Authentication, database, and internationalization included.

features.title: Why TypeScript Next Template?
features.subtitle: Powerful features that provide a modern development experience

typescript.title: TypeScript Support
typescript.description: Ensure type safety and significantly improve development efficiency and code quality.

nextjs.title: Next.js 15
nextjs.description: Build fast, SEO-friendly applications with the latest App Router and Server Components.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Create beautiful UIs efficiently with utility-first CSS framework.

shadcn.title: shadcn/ui
shadcn.description: Achieve consistent design systems with high-quality component library.

auth.title: Authentication System
auth.description: Complete authentication system with NextAuth.js. Login, registration, and password reset support.

database.title: Database
database.description: Type-safe database operations with Prisma ORM and PostgreSQL.

how_it_works.title: Get Started in 3 Steps
how_it_works.subtitle: Simple setup to start development immediately

clone.title: Clone Repository
clone.description: Clone the template from GitHub and initialize your project.

setup.title: Setup Environment
setup.description: Install dependencies and configure environment variables.

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.description: Deploy to Vercel, Netlify, or your preferred platform.

tech_stack.title: Comprehensive Tech Stack
tech_stack.subtitle: Covers technologies used in production environments

pricing.title: Simple Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Optimal plans tailored to your needs

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for personal use and trials

developer1.name: Ken Tanaka
developer1.comment: The combination of TypeScript and Next.js is amazing, and development speed has improved dramatically.

developer2.name: Misaki Sato
developer2.comment: Since the authentication system is built-in from the start, I can create prototypes immediately.

developer3.name: Taro Yamada
developer3.comment: Thanks to Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, I can build beautiful UIs quickly.

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Experience the fastest way to build modern web applications
cta.note: No credit card required • Cancel anytime • Start in 3 minutes

footer.description: Build modern web applications with the power of TypeScript and Next.js.
